jp_text: ナル！ 何やってるんだ

en_text: That's not yours!
jp_text: これは お前のものじゃない

en_text: You don't have to strain yourself!
jp_text:
無理しなくていいんだ！
ナルは俺が守ってやる
google_translated:
You don't have to overdo it!
Naru protects me

en_text: I wanted to fly together with you.
jp_text:
アオ…
私は一緒に飛びたかったの
google_translated:
Ao ...
I wanted to jump together

en_text: Not to be embraced by you.
jp_text:
あなたに
抱っこされたいわけじゃない
google_translated:
for you
I do not want to be hug

en_text: Truth!
jp_text: トゥルース！

en_text: Why...
jp_text: （アオ）あ…

en_text: *T/L Note: and I'll become myself
Next time in Eureka Seven AO.
jp_text:
（レベッカ）
次回 「エウレカセブンＡＯ」

en_text: Ao suffers as the words his mother left behind toss him about.
jp_text:
母の残した言葉に翻弄(ほんろう)され
苦悩するアオ
google_translated:
Tae  to the words left by Mother
Auspicious Ao

en_text: But as the balance breaks, the world accelerates,
jp_text:
しかし崩れ始めた均衡は
世界を加速させ―
google_translated:
But the balance that started to collapse
Accelerate the World-

en_text: throwing the children into a fierce battle,
jp_text: 少年たちに熾烈(しれつ)な戦いを課し―
google_translated: Impose a fierce battle for boys-

en_text: Eureka Seven AO, episode fifteen: Warhead.
jp_text:
「エウレカセブンＡＯ」
第15話…

en_text: Listen to the voices of the children of the stars.
jp_text: （レベッカ）星の子らの叫びを聞け
google_translated: Listen to the cry of the stars
